content:
Morgan Rogers (he/him) said:

She also appeared in an episode of the podcast My Favourite Theorem where she used Yoneda to prove distributivity of multiplication over addition, I think?

I just happen to be watching her talk on "Elements of infinity category theory". She uses the Yoneda lemma this way at minute 47 https://youtu.be/ZVreRhrtUyM?si=oy66w1LUnhtCGasl&t=2820
